title: Environmentalist Awarded With Nobel Prize Will Read Lectures at KTU (Kaunas University of Technology)
text: ( Source : Kaunas University of Technology ) Professor of Princeton , Berkeley , Bath universities, Mankandya has published widely in the areas of climate change, environmental valuation, environmental policy, energy and environment, green
